channel.title: GRIMMCRAFT: A whole new immersive experience!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/9sryo7.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2cp46f7.jpg[/img][/center] [center][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]GrimmCraft is a grief/raid server with a twist![/size][/font][/center]
[size=36pt][font=arial black] IP: 5.135.139.124:25575[/size]
[center][size=14pt]What makes GrimmCraft stand out from the crowd, is it's immersive experience. Every player who has spent time on our server has loved the Pets, they hope to receive crates (to get boss gear), and they find themselves constantly discovering new things in the plugins that they'd never noticed before. This server has [u]EVERYTHING[/u] ready-to-go, the staff, builds, and all the tech related stuff. All we need is a more active player base to help us expand and grow![/size] [/center] [size=24pt][font=verdana] Our Favorite Plugins:[/font][/size] [center] [img]http://dev.bukkit.org/media/images/48/923/Giants_Logo.jpg[/img] [u][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- Giants! They spawn naturally and drop a diamond on death[/size][/font][/u]
[img]http://dev.bukkit.org/media/images/39/724/factionslogo2.png[/img] [u][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- Factions, because what's a grief and raid server without 'em?[/size][/font][/u]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rCwg9xi.gif[/img] [u][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- CraftArrows: Adds SO many new arrows to the game, and makes the bow relevant in PvP again! [/size][/font][/u]
[img]http://dev.bukkit.org/media/images/54/425/logo.png[/img] [u][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6] - Backpacks: Simple to craft, impossible to live without! Adding extra inventory space for those deep-earth mining expeditions, or whatever you may need it for! [/size][/font][/u]
[/center] [center][img]http://i44.tinypic.com/33y6ft4_th.png[/img][/center] [center][u][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- Jobs: Bust your a$$, get paid.[/size][/font][/u] [img]http://dev.bukkit.org/thumbman/images/57/14/200x61/SillyEnchant.png.-m1.png[/img] [u][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- CustomEnchant:[/size][/font] [size=6][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif]Adds a handful of new enchantments![/font][/size][/u] [img]http://dev.bukkit.org/media/images/49/940/sword.png[/img] [font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6][u]-Strange Weapons: TF2 style Strange Weapons that track kills or other stats! (Also, crate drops!)[/u][/size][/font]
[img]http://dev.bukkit.org/media/images/42/755/Pitfall_Logo.png[/img] [size=6][u]-[/u]Pitfall: [/size][u][size=6]Players can leave traps around their base to ward off [/size][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]raiders![/size][/font][/u]
[img]http://mypet.keyle.de/lib/tpl/dokuwiki/images/logo.png[/img] [u][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- MyPet: Tame any mob and level them up for PVP or utility purposes.[/size][/font][/u] [/center] [center] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/o85lyf.png[/img]
[font=comic sans ms][size=18pt]GrimmCraft is proffesionally hosted with very little lag. We were produced by experienced and active owners, and have a mature player base with incredible staff![/size][/font]

item.title: GRIMMCRAFT: A whole new immersive experience!
item.dc:creator: @TheCowfishy TheCowfishy
item.description:
@TheCowfishy wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]

2cp46f7.jpg1366×716
[/center]
[center][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]GrimmCraft is a grief/raid server with a twist![/size][/font][/center]

[size=36pt][font=arial black] IP: 5.135.139.124:25575[/size]

[center][size=14pt]What makes GrimmCraft stand out from the crowd, is it’s immersive experience.
Every player who has spent time on our server has loved the Pets, they hope to receive crates (to get boss gear),
and they find themselves constantly discovering new things in the plugins that they’d never noticed before.
This server has EVERYTHING ready-to-go, the staff, builds, and all the tech related stuff.
All we need is a more active player base to help us expand and grow![/size]
[/center]
[size=24pt][font=verdana] Our Favorite Plugins:[/font][/size]
[center]

[font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- Giants! They spawn naturally and drop a diamond on death[/size][/font]


[font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- Factions, because what’s a grief and raid server without 'em?[/size][/font]

rCwg9xi.gif888×304

[font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- CraftArrows: Adds SO many new arrows to the game, and makes the bow relevant in PvP again! [/size][/font]


[font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6] - Backpacks: Simple to craft, impossible to live without! Adding extra inventory space for those deep-earth mining expeditions, or whatever you may need it for! [/size][/font]

[/center]
[center][/center]
[center][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- Jobs: Bust your a$$, get paid.[/size][/font]

[font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- CustomEnchant:[/size][/font] [size=6][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif]Adds a handful of new enchantments![/font][/size]

[font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]-Strange Weapons: TF2 style Strange Weapons that track kills or other stats! (Also, crate drops!)[/size][/font]


[size=6]-Pitfall: [/size][size=6]Players can leave traps around their base to ward off [/size][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]raiders![/size][/font]


[font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]- MyPet: Tame any mob and level them up for PVP or utility purposes.[/size][/font]
[/center]
[center]

o85lyf.png1366×716

[font=comic sans ms][size=18pt]GrimmCraft is proffesionally hosted with very little lag. We were produced by experienced and active owners,
and have a mature player base with incredible staff![/size][/font]
